segments.text: I see the woman is drying dishes, completely focused on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, trying to reach the cookie jar, and the stool looks unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand reaching up towards the boy, and she looks excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn off the faucet before the kitchen floods and causes a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy compared to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the water soon, or there's going to be a lot of damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and he seems determined to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I'm not sure if they can hear me or if they would listen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying dishes that she doesn't see anything else going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble if the woman catches them taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is quite chaotic, but it's also a bit funny how the woman is completely unaware of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
